text: Holy Week (Latin: Hebdomas Sancta or Hebdomas Maior, "Greater Week"; Greek: Μεγάλη Ἑβδομάς, Megale Hebdomas) is the commemoration of the last week of Jesus Christ's ministry on earth. Holy Week is the last week of Lent. It begins with Palm Sunday and leads up to Easter Sunday. ==Other websites== * Calculate Easter Dates as well as other main variable Feasts during and after Passover * The Days of Holy Week at The Christian Resource Institute * Holy Week and Easter Fast Facts from AOL Research & Learn * Holy Week from the Catholic Encyclopedia Category:Christian holidays
title: Holy Week
